sponsor.partnerMessage: Emcar Stone Studio offers full-service fabrication & installation of quartz, granite, marble & quartzite countertops. A family-owned & operated business with two Springdale locations, they are the number one sink and countertop resource in Northwest Arkansas. Get a free estimate!

posts.title: Fuel For Your Health Event Highlights Innovative Health Technology
posts.content:
Fuel Accelerator and the NWA Tech Summit have partnered to present Fuel For Your Health, discussing how technology is advancing health access, equity, and outcomes at the Record Bentonville on Wednesday, Jun 14, from 5-8p.

  • Explore: Learn about cutting-edge health technology from expert panelists as they share insights on the challenges facing the healthcare industry and the unique innovations being used to address them.
  • Engage: Six innovative startups from Fuel Accelerator's first health cohort will also share presentations, and an afterparty with food, drinks, and networking will follow the event.

Tickets are $25. Reserve yours on the NWA Tech Summit website HERE.

posts.title: Enjoy Cinderella During BGO's Terrific Tuesday Nights
posts.content:
The Botanical Garden of the Ozarks will be transformed into a fairytale for a free performance of Cinderella by the Opera of the Ozarks this Tuesday, Jun 13, at 6p.

  • Terrific: The Botanical Garden of the Ozarks hosts a free, family-friendly series called Terrific Tuesday Nights every week from Jun - Aug from 5-8:30p, opening the garden for free thanks to the Pat & Willard Walker Foundation, Inc. 
  • Packing list: Gates open at 5p, and the show starts at 6p, lasting about an hour. Bring your picnics, blankets, and lawn chairs, but leave the dogs at home... or Fairy Godmother might turn them into a footman.

The event is free, but registration is required. Reserve your spot HERE.

posts.title: Get Amped For The Avett Brothers This Weekend
posts.content:
The heartfelt folk sound of The Avett Brothers will fill the Walmart AMP as they take the stage with opener Gov't Mule this Saturday, Jun 17 ‚Äî gates open at 6p, and the tunes kick off at 7:30p.

  • Caroline Jubilee: Hailing from North Carolina, this talented band's blend of folk-rock melodies and heartfelt lyrics has earned them three Grammy nominations, several Billboard Top 200 appearances, and a devoted fan base.
  • Summer Day: The open-air atmosphere of the Walmart AMP makes for the perfect backdrop to this summer show, and don't forget about the add-ons now available with ticket purchases, like the new AMP Underground.

We're giving away two lawn tickets to one of our NWA Daily Fans! If you're part of our Fan Program, reply to this email for a chance to win!

posts.title: NWA Polo Club Celebrates Ten Years
posts.content:
Celebrating ten years of the global equine sport, NWA Polo will host A Taste of Polo and Wine in Gravette this Thursday, Jun 15, at 5:30p.

  • At a gallop: One of the world's oldest known team sports, polo is played on horseback, using a long-handled wooden mallet to hit a small hard ball through the opposing team's goal.
  • Join the club: Bring a lawn chair, blanket, and picnic during a match, and those 21 and older can enjoy complimentary wine. Follow NWA Polo Club online for more information, including other upcoming events.

Find more information and how to RSVP HERE.

posts.title: Airship Opens Bentonville‚Äôs First Neighborhood Cafe: Airship at the Pumphouse
posts.content:
Bentonville's newest neighborhood cafe opens today with the launch of Airship at the Pumphouse on NW A St., open from 7a-7p.

  • Excellent flow: With a unique blend of crayon box colors and exposed industrial pipes, the design of the multi-level cafe pays homage to its historic site, which once served as the city's sole water treatment plant, pumping water from Ford Spring into the city's iconic water tower, and was later used as a childcare center.
  • Neighborly vibe: Easily accessible by bike and foot, the Pumphouse feels like an extension of the neighborhood with its outdoor space, terraced patio, indoor community area, bike service studio, and of course, Airship's delicious coffee along with an expanded menu of culinary options.

Let the staff know you'd like the NWA Daily discount and receive 10% off your order from Jun 12-16, and follow Airship for updates HERE.
